traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Intelligence score increases by 1.

traits.name: Age
traits.description: Purebloods mature at the same rate as humans and have lifespans similar in length to theirs.

traits.name: Alignment
traits.description: Purebloods are devoid of emotion and see others as tools to manipulate. They care little for law or chaos and are typically neutral evil.

traits.name: Size
traits.description: Purebloods match humans in average size and weight. Your size is Medium.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 30 feet.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.description: You know the poison spray cantrip. You can cast animal friendship an unlimited number of times with this trait, but you can target only snakes with it. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast suggestion with this trait. Once you cast it, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Poison Immunity
traits.description: You are immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.

traits.name: Languages
traits.description: You can speak, read, and write Common, Abyssal, and Draconic.
